website_summaries.verdict: With presets for brewing tea at ideal temperatures and an internal steep timer, the Mr. Coffee Tea Maker does more than merely boil water, but this is no fully automatic tea dream machine.
pros: For just a little bit more than a basic electric kettle, the Mr. Coffee Tea Maker matches water temperature with specific types of tea and keeps tabs on steeping time
The appliance is also compact occupying less kitchen counter space, and is artfully styled
cons: The Mr. Coffee Tea Maker sometimes overshoots its target brewing temperature, and its lack of a display can be confusing
The brewer isn't fully automatic and requires you to add and remove tea leaves by hand
